Detailed Description

This class provide methods to text services communication.

The TextServicesManager class provides methods for text services communication.

The following example demonstrates how to use the TextServicesManager 

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstenceState){


  Context* context = new Context(this);

 //new the TextServicesManager instance
 TextServicesManager *pTSM = new TextServicesManager(Context);

 }
